title: Creating a New Rank Team!!
body: Anyone stuck in Bronze and Silver? meet feeder and afk? need a team? leave a comment here, if we enough 5 people, we can go straight for team rank :D anyway, i need rank team so crazy, leave your name here ok? i will add you guys and we can get a ward skin as well :v hope to see u guys join with me :D

replies.body:
I'll join the team!
I play top, jungle and support.
i added you :D i will set up our main role(tell me your role you want to be in yeh?), then we can FOCUS on practising our main role to get a better record!! Thks for joining!! :p

IGN: Make a Guess 
add me I'm active very often.
ADC or SP pref(although I can mid and top as well)

Thanks.
i added you :D i will set up our main role(tell me your role you want to be in yeh?), then we can FOCUS on practising our main role to get a better record!! Thks for joining!! :p
My absolute main is support. Although I'm trying to branch out to be more versatile. No matter, I'll gladly play support when you need me to.
sure! welcome to team yeh? ^^
ill join, add salchis, ill be on today
i added you :D i will set up our main role(tell me your role you want to be in yeh?), then we can FOCUS on practising our main role to get a better record!! Thks for joining!! :p

I'm number one braum in oce pre much best support in bronze
and my adc is called Brock Lesnar
i added you :D i will set up our main role(tell me your role you want to be in yeh?), then we can FOCUS on practising our main role to get a better record!! Thks for joining!! :p
add me if you require anyone else :)
i added you :D i will set up our main role(tell me your role you want to be in yeh?), then we can FOCUS on practising our main role to get a better record!! Thks for joining!! :p

Hello, my ign is uniucky (add me if u want) and i have been looking for a team as well.. I'm in b1 right now and i can climb to silver easily.. I just hate solo q sometimes so i wish to find a team to work with.
As for roles, i can play any role, at least good at 1-2 champs each lane but i have biggest champion pool in support (7-8 champs)
im gold 5 and willing to join a team, ill add you in game

HEY MAN my names descendit I'd LOVE! to join your team, im in b2 43lp and can get to silver atm i've been looking for a team for ages
i can play ANY role and im willing to learn roles im weak at tY <3

Add up! :) Can play any role very well!
Main mid and support, JG is not bad!

Not sure if you still need players... but I'm willing to sub, I'm pretty active! 
Also can skype for team-strats ;)

Bit late but I main mid jg and top (play support if really needed) Add me if there is still space left,
Ty
i can not add you, add me in game
I'll join pls.
Main role is jungle but I can support and mid and adc

Thank you guys ^^ i will add you guys and create a new team, so we need 2 more, my brother is not online usual, so maybe we need to find 2 more ppl, if you guys have anyone, just invite them yeh ^^
our team name is IncredibleOfImplement(IOI) is that ok?
and do u guys have skype? then we can speak to each other when we are playing
